entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
